nember.name: T:Namespace.Logging.NLog
nember.summary: Provides logging functionalities with different levels.

nember.name: T:Namespace.NLog.EnableConsoleOutput
nember.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable console output for log entries.

nember.name: T:Namespace.NLog.Log
nember.summary: Logs a message with a specified level and optional exception.

nember.name: T:Namespace.NLog.Error
nember.summary: Logs an error message with an optional exception.

nember.name: T:Namespace.NLog.Warning
nember.summary: Logs a warning message with an optional exception.

nember.name: T:Namespace.NLog.Error
nember.summary: Logs an error message with an exception and additional details like method, line, and class.

nember.name: T:Namespace.NLog.Warning
nember.summary: Logs a warning message with an exception and additional details like method, line, and class.
